meaningMnemonic: You take a <radical>lid</radical>, and aiming it at the <radical>sun</radical> you <radical>kick</radical> it into the air and eventually it begins to <kanji>decline</kanji> and crashes into the sun, causing it to supernova. Imagine kicking this lid so hard that it flies into space. See it fly up to the peak of its arch, then watch as it begins the decline until it finally collides with the sun.
readingMnemonic: As the lid begins to <kanji>decline</kanji> in the sky, you realize what’s going to happen so you attempt to <reading>swi</reading>ng (すい) to safety. Swing on some vines in the direction opposite of the sun. You know that once that lid finishes its decline and collides with the sun, there’s gonna be trouble.
